alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Henry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 12:09PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Benton, northeastern Carroll and southeastern Henry Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1209 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vale, or 9 miles northeast of Huntingdon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camden, Bruceton, Vale, Springville, Hollow Rock, Big Sandy, Mansfield, Haigler Ridge, Manleyville, Old Springville, Mixie, Spring Creek, Crews Store and Ephesus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
